objects.specification: A smooth, light beige plastered interior wall with a subtle matte finish, designed to serve as a neutral backdrop for vibrant educational decorations, ensuring minimal glare and a uniform surface.

A durable vinyl floor with a molded woodgrain pattern in warm brown tones, providing a resilient, easy-to-clean surface suitable for high-traffic classroom environments, with a slightly textured finish for slip resistance.

A spacious teacher's desk with a smooth dark brown walnut veneer finish on a robust metal frame, featuring a modesty panel, cable management grommet, and a locking storage drawer on one side for essentials.

Comfortable teacher office chair combining a ventilated mesh back with a softly padded seat upholstered in charcoal grey fabric, supported by a height-adjustable metal base and caster wheels for easy mobility.

Large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy, stain-resistant writing surface framed in anodized silver aluminum, including an integrated marker tray at the bottom and compatibility with magnetic accessories.

A suspended dinosaur skeleton display consisting of intricately molded bone replicas in an off-white finish, carefully articulated and strung with nearly invisible supports, designed to hang from the ceiling and provide a compelling three-dimensional exhibit.

A highly detailed, lifelike dinosaur model created with realistic skin textures, subtle color gradients, and anatomically accurate proportions, crafted from durable resin material, showcasing dynamic posture and fine surface details to engage students.

Soft, durable area rug featuring a vibrant dinosaur footprint pattern in earthy greens and browns, made from low-pile synthetic fibers with anti-slip backing, offering a comfortable, thematic accent in the classroom's central walkway.

Tall bookshelf constructed from laminated particle board in a dark oak finish, featuring multiple adjustable shelves filled with illustrated dinosaur reference volumes and durable bookends, designed for easy organization and accessibility.

Educational globe with detailed cartography highlighting prehistoric continental configurations and major dinosaur fossil sites, printed on a matte surface and mounted on a minimalist metal stand with smooth rotational mechanics.
Compact cylindrical waste bin in dark grey plastic with a matte finish and a simple open-top design, sized for classroom use and easy emptying.

children.specification: A handcrafted dinosaur fossil replica made from resin with a weathered bone finish and fine surface etching, accurately capturing the texture and contours of paleontological specimens for educational display.

objects.specification: A small rectangular display table with a sturdy metal frame and a tempered glass top, ideal for showcasing fossil replicas and dinosaur egg models, featuring minimalistic lines and a subtle brushed finish.

children.specification: Realistic dinosaur egg model sculpted from durable plastic, painted with subtle speckled patterns in neutral tones, and displayed upright on small integrated stands to illustrate egg morphology.
